name: Haunted Tower (Berni)
description:
Haunted Tower is a submission for the The Nokia 3310 Jam  3! https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3

Haunted Tower was developed by Bernard Ensing and Austin Blaylock. Our goal was to create an "unlimited runner" style game that someone with a Nokia 3310 would have had an endless gaming experience trying to get the highest score among friends. I still have a hand-me-down 3310 (unfortunately won't turn on) and I like to imagine that this game would bring people of the past and present joy.

Try to get through as many floors as you can! Currently my high score is 15 don't @ me.

Features: 

Procedurally generated floors for unlimited  game play!

 Followed the  optional theme of: ON / OFF

 84 x 48 resolution to match the Nokia 3310 screen size.

Monophonic audio.
